text:
Q: Is it possible to configure pytest-cov to show coverage of data files? A:

Show us your code, even if it does not yet quite do what you want. Perhaps there's a GitHub repo URL you could share?

Q: Pyqt5 Why does my image load as a PNG but not a JPG? A:

I think this maybe related to the Python package manager. I use miniforge to setup the environment and everything works fine. But when I switch to pixi,

print(QtGui.QImageReader.supportedImageFormats())

didn't outout jpeg.

Q: How to quit an iPython notebook debug session? A:

It's a bit counterintuitive compared to a normal shell.

You want to use either exit or quit.

Because submitting either exit() or quit() not only kills the notebook kernel but also fails to escape debugging mode.

Q: Cannot retrieve the value and get the response in node app A:

Your app connects to MongoDB Atlas successfully, but crashes when querying collections due to a JavaScript heap out of memory error. This typically means your Node.js process is exceeding its memory limit.

  1. Increase Node.js memory limit

use below query:

node --max-old-space-size=2048 server.js

OR

  1. Optimize MongoDB queries

please avoid loading entire collections instead use below query:

Model.find({}, { field1: 1, field2: 1 }).limit(100)

Use .limit() and projections to reduce memory usage.

Q: Is it possible to connect the New Outlook for Windows to our own server? A:

Depends on what your code does - if you want to hit your own server every time the user does something, like clicking your button, you can certainly do that from a web addin. If you need some kind of persistent connection - can't do that: web addins are loaded on demand only and you get at most 30 seconds to run; after that, your script is terminated.
